overview: Short film based on letters sent from The Brazilian Film Director Glauber Rocha to his former Assistant and friend, Jirges Ristum, father of the director André Ristum. The film is about a friendship and a work relation, and was directed by the son of Jirges and edited by the son of Glauber, Eryk Rocha.
title: De Glauber Para Jirges
